status_effects.name: Poisoned
status_effects.description: Take poison damage at the start of each turn. Disadvantage on attack rolls.

status_effects.name: Burning
status_effects.description: Take fire damage at the start of each turn.

status_effects.name: Stunned
status_effects.description: Cannot take actions. Attacks against you have advantage.

status_effects.name: Paralyzed
status_effects.description: Cannot move or take actions. Auto-crit if hit in melee.

status_effects.name: Blinded
status_effects.description: Cannot see. Disadvantage on attack rolls. Attacks against you have advantage.

status_effects.name: Frightened
status_effects.description: Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls while source of fear is visible.

status_effects.name: Charmed
status_effects.description: Cannot attack the charmer. Charmer has advantage on social checks.

status_effects.name: Slowed
status_effects.description: Speed halved. -2 to AC and Dexterity saves. Cannot take reactions.

status_effects.name: Hasted
status_effects.description: Speed doubled. +2 to AC. Additional action each turn.

status_effects.name: Invisible
status_effects.description: Cannot be seen. Advantage on attack rolls. Attacks against you have disadvantage.

status_effects.name: Blessed
status_effects.description: +1d4 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws.

status_effects.name: Cursed
status_effects.description: -1d4 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws.

status_effects.name: Regenerating
status_effects.description: Heal at the start of each turn.

status_effects.name: Defending
status_effects.description: +2 AC until next turn. Applied by defend action.

status_effects.name: Dodging
status_effects.description: Attacks against you have disadvantage until next turn.
